name: Aero Vacation
description:
"...well worth checking out..." — Internet Gumshoe, 80%

BE THE CAPTAIN OF AN AIRSHIP HOTEL! Cruise around the world in the best vacation destination ever to sail the skies. Welcome passengers aboard with perks like rollercoasters and water parks, and take off on a high-flying adventure!

CREATE & ENJOY THE BEST VACATION EVER...

•SEE THE WORLD – Fancy yourself a globetrotter? Visit famous cities like Tokyo, Los Angeles and Athens.
•MAKE IT YOUR OWN – Choose your vessel and personalize it with a customizable logo, hull paint, and motto.
•KEEP ‘EM HAPPY – Upgrade your airship with luxury facilities like nightclubs and golf courses. Scoop up blueprints when at port and build even more amazing amenities for your passengers.

CONNECT WITH AIR PALS
Why not visit your friends' airships as you navigate the globe? Better still, invite your friends to join you. Check on each other’s progress, boost energy, and see who has the best ship in the air.

Ready to take off? Start building your dream resort now!
